Room.Name: Golden Dolphin Way
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Golden Dolphin Way, south of the Oceancrest Stables.
Room.LongDescription: The Oceancrest Stables and Walking Yards are to the north of Golden Dolphin Way, providing very luxurious accomodations for long term visitors of Oceancrest. The Walking Yard allows horses to get their daily exercise without having to take them out into the fields or out of town. There is not a lot of walking space along the streets with all the other pedestrian traffic.
